name: 癒しのクラゲ育成ゲーム
summary:
This is the best jellyfish app.
- You can grow a jellyfish.
- You can know growth of jellyfish in real time.
- Operation is very easy!

Care is very easy. You should feed jellyfish once every three days, and change the water only once a week.
Jellyfish is very small at first, but it will grow bigger little by little every day.
Enjoy the growth of jellyfish in your daily life.
info:
• 中文名: 治愈的养成水母
  • 别名: Jellyfish Aquarium
  • 平台: Android / iOS
  • 游戏类型: SIM
  • 游戏开发: Hiroki Yamada
  • 发行日期: 2015-10-29
